description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Search, Collect, Survive, The Zombie Apocalypse! Open world sand box zombie survival game with 1 - 16 player online PvP! Fully repairable vehicles and tents to save your loot in. You'll need to use all your survival skills to avoid or destroy the 2000 zombies on this map. Don't forget to get food, water, medical supplies, and weapons on your journey.
